sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.OCFormatter</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>OCFormatter</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var OCFormatter = Class.create();
OCFormatter.DATE_STRIPPER = /[-: ]/g;
OCFormatter.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getId: function(item) {
		var start = item.start+"";
		start = start.replace(OCFormatter.DATE_STRIPPER, '');
		var end = item.end+"";
		end = end.replace(OCFormatter.DATE_STRIPPER, '');
		
		var id = item.order + "_cal_item_" +
			item.table + "_" +
			item.sys_id  + "_" + 
			(JSUtil.nil(item.roster_id) ? "" : "cmn_rota_roster_" + item.roster_id + "_") +
			start + "_" + end;
		return id;
	},

	toString: function(){
			return this.type;
	}, 
	
    type: 'OCFormatter'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-01-08 11:38:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2dd98a82c3301200b6dcdfdc64d3ae06</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>OCFormatter</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="On-Call Scheduling" source="com.snc.on_call_rotation">4bca78ec3cf1311068bcf327dfe37f86</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2dd98a82c3301200b6dcdfdc64d3ae06</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-04-07 02:13:37</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
